subject: Implement voice session persistence
description:
Persist voice transcripts to Supermemory for continuity:
- On session end: Save transcripts array to Supermemory via hook
- On session start: Load recent voice context (last 24h)
- Add `exportSession()` method to VoiceCore
- Add `loadPreviousContext()` for continuity
- Store: transcripts, complexity scores, provider usage, timestamps
- Enable session replay for debugging

Integration with:
- ~/.claude/hooks/session-optimizer-stop.sh
- ~/.claude/memory/supermemory.db
